title: Redesigning an Emotional Inquiry-Based Education System: Mobile Microlearning Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational systems and mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on redesigning language education systems using emotional inquiry methodologies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to analyze existing system strengths by applying the four-stage emotional inquiry (AI) process: Discovery-Dream-Design-Realization
Learners propose at least three designs for language education systems optimized for mobile environments
Learners identify at least five improvement points for system prototypes by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
